```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
iris_graph <- ggplot(iris, aes(x= Petal.Length, y = Petal.Width)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = Species)) +
  theme_classic() +
  facet_wrap(~ Species, scales = "free") 
  
iris_graph
```
